name: rimrcl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, crs, c2)), wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe)))

stmt.origin: elmpt2cl(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, crs, c2, universe, universe, crab(hs2, co(cv(hs0), crh, cv(hs1)), wcel(ccnv(cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs1), crh, cv(hs0)))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, crs, c2)), wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe)))
-| wceq(crs, cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, crab(hs2, co(cv(hs0), crh, cv(hs1)), wcel(ccnv(cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs1), crh, cv(hs0))))))
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffsc(hs0, universe)
-| diffsc(hs0, universe)
-| diffsc(hs1, universe)
-| diffsc(hs1, universe)

⊢ (c0 ∈(c1[RingIso]c2)→(c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌))
⊣ RingIso =(hs0 ∈ 𝕌, hs1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ { hs2 ∈(hs0[RingHom]hs1)| `' hs2 ∈(hs1[RingHom]hs0)})
⊣ d(hs0, hs1)
